sn22.34:1.3: Tam vo pahinam hitaya sukhaya bhavissati.
sn22.34:1.5: Rupam, bhikkhave, na tumhakam, tam pajahatha.
sn22.34:1.6: Tam vo pahinam hitaya sukhaya bhavissati.
sn22.34:1.11: Tam vo pahinam hitaya sukhaya bhavissati.
sn22.34:1.12: Yam, bhikkhave, na tumhakam tam pajahatha.
sn22.34:1.13: Tam vo pahinam hitaya sukhaya bhavissati”ti.
